rules.description: Change Ins/Del to Ctrl+Left/Right in Leopold FC660M
Change LCtrl+Shift+Ins to LCtrl+Shift+Power in Leopold FC660M
Change Fn+NumRow to FuncRow in Leopold FC660M
HHKB diamond arrows in Apple Internal Keyboard
Esc/~ swap helpers (cmd+`, fn+del) in Apple Internal Keyboard
Change RShift + Backslash to forward delete (rev 2.1)
Change RWin to Ctrl+Up in MS Sculpt
Change m to left_arrow*2, k to right_arrow*2
